title: Chamorro-English (1908) New Testament
title_vernacular: Chamorro-English (1908) Nuebo Testamenton Ingles yan Chamorro
description: Chamorro translation of the New Testament was published in 1908 by the American Bible Society. The Chamorros are the indigenous people of the Mariana Islands of which Guam is the largest and southernmost on an island chain. Archeological evidence identified civilization dating back 5,000 years.

language.name: Chamorro
language.area: Also in Northern Mariana Islands, United States.
